OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: The IP is used to submit order. You can enable either CPQ or OM flow by enabling/disabling CreateAssetFlow-CPQ or CreateAssetFlow-OM.
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: SubmitSubOrder

omniProcessElements.name: canSubmitOrder
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "additionalInput" : { "cartId" : "%ContextId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "SubmitOrderService", "remoteMethod" : "canSubmitOrder", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: CheckoutWithCPQ
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "ContextId" : "%ContextId%", "cartId" : "%ContextId%", "orderId" : "%ContextId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%canSubmitOrder:canSubmitOrder%=true AND %SetCreateAssetsValue:createAssetsFlow%='CPQ'", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction2", "remoteClass" : "vlocity_cmt.CPQAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "checkout", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: CreateAssetsFlow-OM
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "Type__c" : { "label" : "Set Values", "type" : "action" }, "actionMessage" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "createAssetsFlow" : "OM" }, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "label" : "SetValues3", "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "rollbackOnError" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : null, "trackingCustomData" : { } }

omniProcessElements.name: CreateOrUpdateAssetRelationship
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "orderId" : "%ContextId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction4", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAssetController", "remoteMethod" : "assetizeProductRelationships", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: DecomposeAndSubmit
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "orderId" : "%ContextId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%canSubmitOrder:canSubmitOrder%=true AND %SetCreateAssetsValue:createAssetsFlow%='OM'", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction3", "remoteClass" : "XOMDecompositionController", "remoteMethod" : "decompose", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: SetCreateAssetsValue
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "elementValueMap" : { "createAssetsFlow" : "=IF(%CreateAssetsFlow-CPQ:createAssetsFlow% = 'CPQ', 'CPQ', IF(%CreateAssetsFlow-CPQ and OM:createAssetsFlow% = 'CPQ-OM','CPQ-OM',IF(%CreateAssetsFlow-OM:createAssetsFlow% = 'OM','OM','CPQ')))" }, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "label" : "SetValues4", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : null }

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "description" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "labelPlural" : "", "labelSingular" : "", "linkToExternalObject" : "", "mockResponseMap" : { }, "nameColumn" : "", "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "rollbackOnError" : false, "trackingCustomData" : { }, "ttlMinutes" : 5 }
